column1: A new IT support channel and knowledge base
column3: Program Management, Demand Estimation , UX Research, Public Speaking, Product Design
column4: I designed and implemented of a new IT support channel and knowledge base for Google.
column5: This project started from a design thinking iteration I did to find innovation opportunities within Google's operations.
column6: This channel overwhelmingly surpassed expectations as it helped ten times more users than initially projected. Using a small fraction of the resources required by other channels, its ROI is unparalleled.
column7: I wrote a thesis about this project

column5: I wanted to learn machine learning while applying this technology to something fun.
column6: I created charts to showcase the results, which give an idea of each politicians' behavior on Twitter.
